title: (x) "More Than A Carpenter" logo - Arial, ITC Garamond {Tom Lukacs, Tiff}
author: new2me

comments.content: Garamond (don’t know which one; there’s like a million different versions) & Arial, I think.
Garamond with a straight leg in the R? Hmm. Maybe the image quality and that stroke/shadow thing is making me go cross-eyed. ITC Garamond Bold Condensed.

Well, if one is Arial, you can’t expect the other to be anything less obvious than ITC Garamond, innit? Sometimes type identification is almost detective work. Deduction and analysis.

Good show, Tiff — now get your eyes back straight. It looks a bit weird. :^D
